'''Saxs Persson''' was an employee of [[Mojang Studios]]. He was working on [[Minecraft]] and was the Chief Creative Officer for [[Minecraft Earth]].

He left Mojang in 2022 for Epic Games where he is an Executive Vice President.<ref>https://www.linkedin.com/in/mipersson/</ref>
